user_query: My company is organizing a driver appreciation event. Please get all the driver-related reservations from LimouCloud API for the period between November 14th and November 20th. Additionally, find out which vehicle is assigned to each driver to add it to the event checklist. Finally, generate an image of Times Square to use for event promotion.

TaskList.description: Retrieve all driver-related reservations from LimouCloud API for the specified date range.
For each driver reservation obtained in step 1, query the vehicle assignment information to include in the event checklist.
Generate an image of Times Square for event promotion purposes.
